Title: Prohibits the establishment, incorporation, construction, or increase in capacity of for-profit nursing homes
Summary: Prohibits the public health and health planning council and the commissioner of health from approving the establishment, incorporation, construction, or increase in capacity of for-profit nursing homes.
LawCode: Add ยง2802-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the establishment, incorporation, construction, or increase in capacity of for-profit nursing homes
